text: The Chikman () is a river in Perm Krai, Russia, a left tributary of the Yayva.Chikman in encyclopedia of Perm Krai It is long with a drainage basin of .«Река ЧИКМАН», Russian State Water Registry It starts on the west slope of North Ural, north of Mount Sheludyak. Its mouth is upstream of the village Sukhaya, from the mouth of the Yayva. There are some small tributaries; the most significant are: * Left: Poludennaya (33 km), Syuz (23 km), Talitsa (18 km); * Right: Sukhaya ==References== Category:Rivers of Perm Krai
title: Chikman (river)
